alfredsnippet.snippet:
Glenn Starkman, Case Western Reserve University, on the weakness of gravity compared to other forces. The Cleveland Plain Dealer, November 5, 2008. Quoted in APS News, Series II, Vol. 17, No.11, December 2008, p.2

"If you hit something, what's stopping you from putting your hand through it is electromagnetism. That's much stronger than the force pulling it down to the ground."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Electromagnetism vs Gravity
